00085         private function HTMLFilterOutput($str)
00086         {
00087                 $str = str_replace('__CAS_VERSION__',$this->getServerVersion(),$str);
00088                 $str = str_replace('__PHPCAS_VERSION__',phpCAS::getVersion(),$str);
00089                 $str = str_replace('__SERVER_BASE_URL__',$this->getServerBaseURL(),$str);
00090                 echo $str;
00091         }
00092 
00100         private $_output_header = '';
00101 
00110         private function printHTMLHeader($title)
00111         {
00112                 $this->HTMLFilterOutput(str_replace('__TITLE__',
00113                 $title,
00114                 (empty($this->_output_header)
00115                 ? '<html><head><title>__TITLE__</title></head><body><h1>__TITLE__</h1>'
00116                 : $this->_output_header)
00117                 )
00118                 );
00119         }

00136         private function printHTMLFooter()
00137         {
00138                 $this->HTMLFilterOutput(empty($this->_output_footer)
00139                 ?('<hr><address>phpCAS __PHPCAS_VERSION__ '.$this->getString(CAS_STR_USING_SERVER).' <a href="__SERVER_BASE_URL__">__SERVER_BASE_URL__</a> (CAS __CAS_VERSION__)</a></address></body></html>')
00140                 :$this->_output_footer);
00141         }

00284         private function getLang()
00285         {

00288                 return $this->_lang;

00299         private $_strings;

00309         private function getString($str)
00310         {
00311                 // call CASclient::getLang() to be sure the language is initialized
00312                 $this->getLang();
00313 
00314                 if ( !isset($this->_strings[$str]) ) {
00315                         trigger_error('string `'.$str.'\' not defined for language `'.$this->getLang().'\'',E_USER_ERROR);
00316                 }
00317                 return $this->_strings[$str];
00318         }

00328         public function setLang($lang)
00329         {
00330                 // include the corresponding language file
00331                 include(dirname(__FILE__).'/languages/'.$lang.'.php');
00332 
00333                 if ( !is_array($this->_strings) ) {
00334                         trigger_error('language `'.$lang.'\' is not implemented',E_USER_ERROR);
00335                 }
00336                 $this->_lang = $lang;
00337         }

00411         private function getServerBaseURL()
00412         {
00413                 // the URL is build only when needed
00414                 if ( empty($this->_server['base_url']) ) {
00415                         $this->_server['base_url'] = 'https://' . $this->getServerHostname();
00416                         if ($this->getServerPort()!=443) {
00417                                 $this->_server['base_url'] .= ':'
00418                                 .$this->getServerPort();
00419                         }
00420                         $this->_server['base_url'] .= $this->getServerURI();
00421                 }
00422                 return $this->_server['base_url'];
00423         }
00424 
00433         public function getServerLoginURL($gateway=false,$renew=false) {
00434                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
00435                 // the URL is build only when needed
00436                 if ( empty($this->_server['login_url']) ) {
00437                         $this->_server['login_url'] = $this->getServerBaseURL();
00438                         $this->_server['login_url'] .= 'login?service=';
00439                         $this->_server['login_url'] .= urlencode($this->getURL());
00440                         if($renew) {
00441                                 // It is recommended that when the "renew" parameter is set, its value be "true"
00442                                 $this->_server['login_url'] .= '&renew=true';
00443                         } elseif ($gateway) {
00444                                 // It is recommended that when the "gateway" parameter is set, its value be "true"
00445                                 $this->_server['login_url'] .= '&gateway=true';
00446                         }
00447                 }
00448                 phpCAS::traceEnd($this->_server['login_url']);
00449                 return $this->_server['login_url'];
00450         }

00500         public function getServerServiceValidateURL()
00501         {
00502                 // the URL is build only when needed
00503                 if ( empty($this->_server['service_validate_url']) ) {
00504                         switch ($this->getServerVersion()) {
00505                                 case CAS_VERSION_1_0:
00506                                         $this->_server['service_validate_url'] = $this->getServerBaseURL().'validate';
00507                                         break;
00508                                 case CAS_VERSION_2_0:
00509                                         $this->_server['service_validate_url'] = $this->getServerBaseURL().'serviceValidate';
00510                                         break;
00511                         }
00512                 }
00513                 return $this->_server['service_validate_url'].'?service='.urlencode($this->getURL());
00514         }
00519         public function getServerSamlValidateURL()
00520         {
00521                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
00522                 // the URL is build only when needed
00523                 if ( empty($this->_server['saml_validate_url']) ) {
00524                         switch ($this->getServerVersion()) {
00525                                 case SAML_VERSION_1_1:
00526                                         $this->_server['saml_validate_url'] = $this->getServerBaseURL().'samlValidate';
00527                                         break;
00528                         }
00529                 }
00530                 phpCAS::traceEnd($this->_server['saml_validate_url'].'?TARGET='.urlencode($this->getURL()));
00531                 return $this->_server['saml_validate_url'].'?TARGET='.urlencode($this->getURL());
00532         }
00537         public function getServerProxyValidateURL()
00538         {
00539                 // the URL is build only when needed

00541                         switch ($this->getServerVersion()) {
00542                                 case CAS_VERSION_1_0:
00543                                         $this->_server['proxy_validate_url'] = '';
00544                                         break;
00545                                 case CAS_VERSION_2_0:
00546                                         $this->_server['proxy_validate_url'] = $this->getServerBaseURL().'proxyValidate';
00547                                         break;
00548                         }
00549                 }
00550                 return $this->_server['proxy_validate_url'].'?service='.urlencode($this->getURL());
00551         }

00624         public function setRequestImplementation ($className) {
00625                 $obj = new $className;
00626                 if (!($obj instanceof CAS_RequestInterface))
00627                 throw new InvalidArgumentException('$className must implement the CAS_RequestInterface');
00628 
00629                 $this->_requestImplementation = $className;
00630         }

00636         private function isHttps() {
00637                 if ( isset($_SERVER['HTTPS']) && !empty($_SERVER['HTTPS']) && $_SERVER['HTTPS'] == 'on') {
00638                         return true;
00639                 } else {
00640                         return false;
00641                 }
00642         }
00643 
00644         // ########################################################################
00645         //  CONSTRUCTOR
00646         // ########################################################################
00659         public function CASClient(
00660         $server_version,
00661         $proxy,
00662         $server_hostname,
00663         $server_port,
00664         $server_uri,
00665         $start_session = true) {
00666 
00667                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
00668 
00669                 $this->_start_session = $start_session;
00670 
00671                 if ($this->_start_session && session_id() !== "")
00672                 {
00673                         phpCAS :: error("Another session was started before phpcas. Either disable the session" .
00674                                 " handling for phpcas in the client() call or modify your application to leave" .
00675                                 " session handling to phpcas");                 
00676                 }
00677                 // skip Session Handling for logout requests and if don't want it'
00678                 if ($start_session && !$this->isLogoutRequest())
00679                 {
00680                         phpCAS :: trace("Starting a new session");
00681                         session_start();
00682                 }
00683 
00684 
00685                 // are we in proxy mode ?
00686                 $this->_proxy = $proxy;
00687 
00688                 // Make cookie handling available.
00689                 if ($this->isProxy()) {
00690                         if (!isset($_SESSION['phpCAS']))
00691                         $_SESSION['phpCAS'] = array();
00692                         if (!isset($_SESSION['phpCAS']['service_cookies']))
00693                         $_SESSION['phpCAS']['service_cookies'] = array();
00694                         $this->_serviceCookieJar = new CAS_CookieJar($_SESSION['phpCAS']['service_cookies']);
00695                 }
00696 
00697                 //check version
00698                 switch ($server_version) {
00699                         case CAS_VERSION_1_0:
00700                                 if ( $this->isProxy() )
00701                                 phpCAS::error('CAS proxies are not supported in CAS '
00702                                 .$server_version);
00703                                 break;
00704                         case CAS_VERSION_2_0:
00705                                 break;
00706                         case SAML_VERSION_1_1:
00707                                 break;
00708                         default:
00709                                 phpCAS::error('this version of CAS (`'
00710                                 .$server_version
00711                                 .'\') is not supported by phpCAS '
00712                                 .phpCAS::getVersion());
00713                 }
00714                 $this->_server['version'] = $server_version;
00715 
00716                 // check hostname
00717                 if ( empty($server_hostname)
00718                 || !preg_match('/[\.\d\-abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz]*/',$server_hostname) ) {
00719                         phpCAS::error('bad CAS server hostname (`'.$server_hostname.'\')');
00720                 }
00721                 $this->_server['hostname'] = $server_hostname;
00722 
00723                 // check port
00724                 if ( $server_port == 0
00725                 || !is_int($server_port) ) {
00726                         phpCAS::error('bad CAS server port (`'.$server_hostname.'\')');
00727                 }
00728                 $this->_server['port'] = $server_port;
00729 
00730                 // check URI
00731                 if ( !preg_match('/[\.\d\-_abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz\/]*/',$server_uri) ) {
00732                         phpCAS::error('bad CAS server URI (`'.$server_uri.'\')');
00733                 }
00734                 // add leading and trailing `/' and remove doubles
00735                 $server_uri = preg_replace('/\/\//','/','/'.$server_uri.'/');
00736                 $this->_server['uri'] = $server_uri;
00737 
00738                 // set to callback mode if PgtIou and PgtId CGI GET parameters are provided
00739                 if ( $this->isProxy() ) {
00740                         $this->setCallbackMode(!empty($_GET['pgtIou'])&&!empty($_GET['pgtId']));
00741                 }
00742 
00743                 if ( $this->isCallbackMode() ) {
00744                         //callback mode: check that phpCAS is secured
00745                         if ( !$this->isHttps() ) {
00746                                 phpCAS::error('CAS proxies must be secured to use phpCAS; PGT\'s will not be received from the CAS server');
00747                         }
00748                 } else {
00749                         //normal mode: get ticket and remove it from CGI parameters for developpers
00750                         $ticket = (isset($_GET['ticket']) ? $_GET['ticket'] : null);
00751                         switch ($this->getServerVersion()) {
00752                                 case CAS_VERSION_1_0: // check for a Service Ticket
00753                                         if( preg_match('/^ST-/',$ticket) ) {
00754                                                 phpCAS::trace('ST \''.$ticket.'\' found');
00755                                                 //ST present
00756                                                 $this->setST($ticket);
00757                                                 //ticket has been taken into account, unset it to hide it to applications
00758                                                 unset($_GET['ticket']);
00759                                         } else if ( !empty($ticket) ) {
00760                                                 //ill-formed ticket, halt
00761                                                 phpCAS::error('ill-formed ticket found in the URL (ticket=`'.htmlentities($ticket).'\')');
00762                                         }
00763                                         break;
00764                                 case CAS_VERSION_2_0: // check for a Service or Proxy Ticket
00765                                         if( preg_match('/^[SP]T-/',$ticket) ) {
00766                                                 phpCAS::trace('ST or PT \''.$ticket.'\' found');
00767                                                 $this->setPT($ticket);
00768                                                 unset($_GET['ticket']);
00769                                         } else if ( !empty($ticket) ) {
00770                                                 //ill-formed ticket, halt
00771                                                 phpCAS::error('ill-formed ticket found in the URL (ticket=`'.htmlentities($ticket).'\')');
00772                                         }
00773                                         break;
00774                                 case SAML_VERSION_1_1: // SAML just does Service Tickets
00775                                         if( preg_match('/^[SP]T-/',$ticket) ) {
00776                                                 phpCAS::trace('SA \''.$ticket.'\' found');
00777                                                 $this->setSA($ticket);
00778                                                 unset($_GET['ticket']);
00779                                         } else if ( !empty($ticket) ) {
00780                                                 //ill-formed ticket, halt
00781                                                 phpCAS::error('ill-formed ticket found in the URL (ticket=`'.htmlentities($ticket).'\')');
00782                                         }
00783                                         break;
00784                         }
00785                 }
00786                 phpCAS::traceEnd();
00787         }
00788

00816         private function renameSession($ticket)
00817         {
00818                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
00819                 if($this->_start_session){
00820                         if (!empty ($this->_user))
00821                         {
00822                                 $old_session = $_SESSION;
00823                                 session_destroy();
00824                                 // set up a new session, of name based on the ticket
00825                                 $session_id = preg_replace('/[^\w]/', '', $ticket);
00826                                 phpCAS :: trace("Session ID: ".$session_id);
00827                                 session_id($session_id);
00828                                 session_start();
00829                                 phpCAS :: trace("Restoring old session vars");
00830                                 $_SESSION = $old_session;
00831                         } else
00832                         {
00833                                 phpCAS :: error('Session should only be renamed after successfull authentication');
00834                         }
00835                 }else{
00836                         phpCAS :: trace("Skipping session rename since phpCAS is not handling the session.");
00837                 }
00838                 phpCAS::traceEnd();
00839         }

00878         public function getUser()
00879         {
00880                 if ( empty($this->_user) ) {
00881                         phpCAS::error('this method should be used only after '.__CLASS__.'::forceAuthentication() or '.__CLASS__.'::isAuthenticated()');

00900         private $_attributes = array();
00901 
00902         public function setAttributes($attributes)
00903         { $this->_attributes = $attributes; }
00904 
00905         public function getAttributes() {
00906                 if ( empty($this->_user) ) { // if no user is set, there shouldn't be any attributes also...
00907                         phpCAS::error('this method should be used only after '.__CLASS__.'::forceAuthentication() or '.__CLASS__.'::isAuthenticated()');
00908                 }
00909                 return $this->_attributes;
00910         }
00911 
00912         public function hasAttributes()
00913         { return !empty($this->_attributes); }
00914 
00915         public function hasAttribute($key)
00916         { return (is_array($this->_attributes) && array_key_exists($key, $this->_attributes)); }
00917 
00918         public function getAttribute($key)      {
00919                 if($this->hasAttribute($key)) {
00920                         return $this->_attributes[$key];
00921                 }
00922         }
00923 
00929         public function renewAuthentication(){
00930                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
00931                 // Either way, the user is authenticated by CAS
00932                 if( isset( $_SESSION['phpCAS']['auth_checked'] ) )
00933                 unset($_SESSION['phpCAS']['auth_checked']);
00934                 if ( $this->isAuthenticated() ) {
00935                         phpCAS::trace('user already authenticated; renew');
00936                         $this->redirectToCas(false,true);
00937                 } else {
00938                         $this->redirectToCas();
00939                 }
00940                 phpCAS::traceEnd();
00941         }
00942 
00948         public function forceAuthentication()
00949         {
00950                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
00951 
00952                 if ( $this->isAuthenticated() ) {
00953                         // the user is authenticated, nothing to be done.
00954                         phpCAS::trace('no need to authenticate');
00955                         $res = TRUE;
00956                 } else {
00957                         // the user is not authenticated, redirect to the CAS server
00958                         if (isset($_SESSION['phpCAS']['auth_checked'])) {
00959                                 unset($_SESSION['phpCAS']['auth_checked']);
00960                         }
00961                         $this->redirectToCas(FALSE/* no gateway */);
00962                         // never reached
00963                         $res = FALSE;
00964                 }
00965                 phpCAS::traceEnd($res);
00966                 return $res;
00967         }
00968 
00974         private $_cache_times_for_auth_recheck = 0;
00975 
00981         public function setCacheTimesForAuthRecheck($n)
00982         {
00983                 $this->_cache_times_for_auth_recheck = $n;
00984         }
00985 
00990         public function checkAuthentication()
00991         {
00992                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
00993 
00994                 if ( $this->isAuthenticated() ) {
00995                         phpCAS::trace('user is authenticated');
00996                         $res = TRUE;
00997                 } else if (isset($_SESSION['phpCAS']['auth_checked'])) {
00998                         // the previous request has redirected the client to the CAS server with gateway=true
00999                         unset($_SESSION['phpCAS']['auth_checked']);
01000                         $res = FALSE;
01001                 } else {
01002                         // avoid a check against CAS on every request
01003                         if (! isset($_SESSION['phpCAS']['unauth_count']) )
01004                         $_SESSION['phpCAS']['unauth_count'] = -2; // uninitialized
01005                                 
01006                         if (($_SESSION['phpCAS']['unauth_count'] != -2 && $this->_cache_times_for_auth_recheck == -1)
01007                         || ($_SESSION['phpCAS']['unauth_count'] >= 0 && $_SESSION['phpCAS']['unauth_count'] < $this->_cache_times_for_auth_recheck))
01008                         {
01009                                 $res = FALSE;
01010 
01011                                 if ($this->_cache_times_for_auth_recheck != -1)
01012                                 {
01013                                         $_SESSION['phpCAS']['unauth_count']++;
01014                                         phpCAS::trace('user is not authenticated (cached for '.$_SESSION['phpCAS']['unauth_count'].' times of '.$this->_cache_times_for_auth_recheck.')');
01015                                 }
01016                                 else
01017                                 {
01018                                         phpCAS::trace('user is not authenticated (cached for until login pressed)');
01019                                 }
01020                         }
01021                         else
01022                         {
01023                                 $_SESSION['phpCAS']['unauth_count'] = 0;
01024                                 $_SESSION['phpCAS']['auth_checked'] = true;
01025                                 phpCAS::trace('user is not authenticated (cache reset)');
01026                                 $this->redirectToCas(TRUE/* gateway */);
01027                                 // never reached
01028                                 $res = FALSE;
01029                         }
01030                 }
01031                 phpCAS::traceEnd($res);
01032                 return $res;
01033         }
01034 
01041         public function isAuthenticated()
01042         {
01043                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
01044                 $res = FALSE;
01045                 $validate_url = '';
01046 
01047                 if ( $this->wasPreviouslyAuthenticated() ) {
01048                         if($this->hasST() || $this->hasPT() || $this->hasSA()){
01049                                 // User has a additional ticket but was already authenticated
01050                                 phpCAS::trace('ticket was present and will be discarded, use renewAuthenticate()');
01051                                 header('Location: '.$this->getURL());
01052                                 phpCAS::trace( "Prepare redirect to remove ticket: ".$this->getURL() );
01053                                 phpCAS::traceExit();
01054                                 exit();
01055                         }else{
01056                                 // the user has already (previously during the session) been
01057                                 // authenticated, nothing to be done.
01058                                 phpCAS::trace('user was already authenticated, no need to look for tickets');
01059                                 $res = TRUE;
01060                         }
01061                 }
01062                 else {
01063                         if ( $this->hasST() ) {
01064                                 // if a Service Ticket was given, validate it
01065                                 phpCAS::trace('ST `'.$this->getST().'\' is present');
01066                                 $this->validateST($validate_url,$text_response,$tree_response); // if it fails, it halts
01067                                 phpCAS::trace('ST `'.$this->getST().'\' was validated');
01068                                 if ( $this->isProxy() ) {
01069                                         $this->validatePGT($validate_url,$text_response,$tree_response); // idem
01070                                         phpCAS::trace('PGT `'.$this->getPGT().'\' was validated');
01071                                         $_SESSION['phpCAS']['pgt'] = $this->getPGT();
01072                                 }
01073                                 $_SESSION['phpCAS']['user'] = $this->getUser();
01074                                 if($this->hasAttributes()){
01075                                         $_SESSION['phpCAS']['attributes'] = $this->getAttributes();
01076                                 }
01077                                 $res = TRUE;
01078                                 $logoutTicket = $this->getST();
01079                         }
01080                         elseif ( $this->hasPT() ) {
01081                                 // if a Proxy Ticket was given, validate it
01082                                 phpCAS::trace('PT `'.$this->getPT().'\' is present');
01083                                 $this->validatePT($validate_url,$text_response,$tree_response); // note: if it fails, it halts
01084                                 phpCAS::trace('PT `'.$this->getPT().'\' was validated');
01085                                 if ( $this->isProxy() ) {
01086                                         $this->validatePGT($validate_url,$text_response,$tree_response); // idem
01087                                         phpCAS::trace('PGT `'.$this->getPGT().'\' was validated');
01088                                         $_SESSION['phpCAS']['pgt'] = $this->getPGT();
01089                                 }
01090                                 $_SESSION['phpCAS']['user'] = $this->getUser();
01091                                 if($this->hasAttributes()){
01092                                         $_SESSION['phpCAS']['attributes'] = $this->getAttributes();
01093                                 }
01094                                 $res = TRUE;
01095                                 $logoutTicket = $this->getPT();
01096                         }
01097                         elseif ( $this->hasSA() ) {
01098                                 // if we have a SAML ticket, validate it.
01099                                 phpCAS::trace('SA `'.$this->getSA().'\' is present');
01100                                 $this->validateSA($validate_url,$text_response,$tree_response); // if it fails, it halts
01101                                 phpCAS::trace('SA `'.$this->getSA().'\' was validated');
01102                                 $_SESSION['phpCAS']['user'] = $this->getUser();
01103                                 $_SESSION['phpCAS']['attributes'] = $this->getAttributes();
01104                                 $res = TRUE;
01105                                 $logoutTicket = $this->getSA();
01106                         }
01107                         else {
01108                                 // no ticket given, not authenticated
01109                                 phpCAS::trace('no ticket found');
01110                         }
01111                         if ($res) {
01112                                 // call the post-authenticate callback if registered.
01113                                 if ($this->_postAuthenticateCallbackFunction) {
01114                                         $args = $this->_postAuthenticateCallbackArgs;
01115                                         array_unshift($args, $logoutTicket);
01116                                         call_user_func_array($this->_postAuthenticateCallbackFunction, $args);
01117                                 }
01118                                 
01119                                 // if called with a ticket parameter, we need to redirect to the app without the ticket so that CAS-ification is transparent to the browser (for later POSTS)
01120                                 // most of the checks and errors should have been made now, so we're safe for redirect without masking error messages.
01121                                 // remove the ticket as a security precaution to prevent a ticket in the HTTP_REFERRER
01122                                 if ($this->_clearTicketsFromUrl) {
01123                                         header('Location: '.$this->getURL());
01124                                         phpCAS::trace( "Prepare redirect to : ".$this->getURL() );
01125                                         phpCAS::traceExit();
01126                                         exit();
01127                                 }
01128                         }
01129                 }
01130 
01131                 phpCAS::traceEnd($res);
01132                 return $res;
01133         }
01134 
01140         public function isSessionAuthenticated ()
01141         {
01142                 return !empty($_SESSION['phpCAS']['user']);
01143         }
01144 
01153         private function wasPreviouslyAuthenticated()
01154         {
01155                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
01156 
01157                 if ( $this->isCallbackMode() ) {
01158                         $this->callback();
01159                 }
01160 
01161                 $auth = FALSE;
01162 
01163                 if ( $this->isProxy() ) {
01164                         // CAS proxy: username and PGT must be present
01165                         if ( $this->isSessionAuthenticated() && !empty($_SESSION['phpCAS']['pgt']) ) {
01166                                 // authentication already done
01167                                 $this->setUser($_SESSION['phpCAS']['user']);
01168                                 if(isset($_SESSION['phpCAS']['attributes'])){
01169                                         $this->setAttributes($_SESSION['phpCAS']['attributes']);
01170                                 }
01171                                 $this->setPGT($_SESSION['phpCAS']['pgt']);
01172                                 phpCAS::trace('user = `'.$_SESSION['phpCAS']['user'].'\', PGT = `'.$_SESSION['phpCAS']['pgt'].'\'');
01173                                 
01174                                 // Include the list of proxies
01175                                 if (isset($_SESSION['phpCAS']['proxies'])) {
01176                                         $this->setProxies($_SESSION['phpCAS']['proxies']);
01177                                         phpCAS::trace('proxies = "'.implode('", "', $_SESSION['phpCAS']['proxies']).'"'); 
01178                                 }
01179                                 
01180                                 $auth = TRUE;
01181                         } elseif ( $this->isSessionAuthenticated() && empty($_SESSION['phpCAS']['pgt']) ) {
01182                                 // these two variables should be empty or not empty at the same time
01183                                 phpCAS::trace('username found (`'.$_SESSION['phpCAS']['user'].'\') but PGT is empty');
01184                                 // unset all tickets to enforce authentication
01185                                 unset($_SESSION['phpCAS']);
01186                                 $this->setST('');
01187                                 $this->setPT('');
01188                         } elseif ( !$this->isSessionAuthenticated() && !empty($_SESSION['phpCAS']['pgt']) ) {
01189                                 // these two variables should be empty or not empty at the same time
01190                                 phpCAS::trace('PGT found (`'.$_SESSION['phpCAS']['pgt'].'\') but username is empty');
01191                                 // unset all tickets to enforce authentication
01192                                 unset($_SESSION['phpCAS']);
01193                                 $this->setST('');
01194                                 $this->setPT('');
01195                         } else {
01196                                 phpCAS::trace('neither user not PGT found');
01197                         }
01198                 } else {
01199                         // `simple' CAS client (not a proxy): username must be present
01200                         if ( $this->isSessionAuthenticated() ) {
01201                                 // authentication already done
01202                                 $this->setUser($_SESSION['phpCAS']['user']);
01203                                 if(isset($_SESSION['phpCAS']['attributes'])){
01204                                         $this->setAttributes($_SESSION['phpCAS']['attributes']);
01205                                 }
01206                                 phpCAS::trace('user = `'.$_SESSION['phpCAS']['user'].'\'');
01207                                 
01208                                 // Include the list of proxies
01209                                 if (isset($_SESSION['phpCAS']['proxies'])) {
01210                                         $this->setProxies($_SESSION['phpCAS']['proxies']);
01211                                         phpCAS::trace('proxies = "'.implode('", "', $_SESSION['phpCAS']['proxies']).'"'); 
01212                                 }
01213                                 
01214                                 $auth = TRUE;
01215                         } else {
01216                                 phpCAS::trace('no user found');
01217                         }
01218                 }
01219 
01220                 phpCAS::traceEnd($auth);
01221                 return $auth;
01222         }
01223 
01230         public function redirectToCas($gateway=false,$renew=false){
01231                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
01232                 $cas_url = $this->getServerLoginURL($gateway,$renew);
01233                 header('Location: '.$cas_url);
01234                 phpCAS::trace( "Redirect to : ".$cas_url );
01235 
01236                 $this->printHTMLHeader($this->getString(CAS_STR_AUTHENTICATION_WANTED));
01237 
01238                 printf('<p>'.$this->getString(CAS_STR_SHOULD_HAVE_BEEN_REDIRECTED).'</p>',$cas_url);
01239                 $this->printHTMLFooter();
01240 
01241                 phpCAS::traceExit();
01242                 exit();
01243         }
01244 
01245 
01250         public function logout($params) {
01251                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
01252                 $cas_url = $this->getServerLogoutURL();
01253                 $paramSeparator = '?';
01254                 if (isset($params['url'])) {
01255                         $cas_url = $cas_url . $paramSeparator . "url=" . urlencode($params['url']);
01256                         $paramSeparator = '&';
01257                 }
01258                 if (isset($params['service'])) {
01259                         $cas_url = $cas_url . $paramSeparator . "service=" . urlencode($params['service']);
01260                 }
01261                 header('Location: '.$cas_url);
01262                 phpCAS::trace( "Prepare redirect to : ".$cas_url );
01263 
01264                 session_unset();
01265                 session_destroy();
01266 
01267                 $this->printHTMLHeader($this->getString(CAS_STR_LOGOUT));
01268                 printf('<p>'.$this->getString(CAS_STR_SHOULD_HAVE_BEEN_REDIRECTED).'</p>',$cas_url);
01269                 $this->printHTMLFooter();
01270 
01271                 phpCAS::traceExit();
01272                 exit();
01273         }
01274 
01278         private function isLogoutRequest() {
01279                 return !empty($_POST['logoutRequest']);
01280         }
01281 
01289         public function handleLogoutRequests($check_client=true, $allowed_clients=false) {
01290                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
01291                 if (!$this->isLogoutRequest()) {
01292                         phpCAS::trace("Not a logout request");
01293                         phpCAS::traceEnd();
01294                         return;
01295                 }
01296                 if(!$this->_start_session && is_null($this->_signoutCallbackFunction)){
01297                         phpCAS::trace("phpCAS can't handle logout requests if it does not manage the session.");
01298                 }
01299                 phpCAS::trace("Logout requested");
01300                 phpCAS::trace("SAML REQUEST: ".$_POST['logoutRequest']);
01301                 if ($check_client) {
01302                         if (!$allowed_clients) {
01303                                 $allowed_clients = array( $this->getServerHostname() );
01304                         }
01305                         $client_ip = $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR'];
01306                         $client = gethostbyaddr($client_ip);
01307                         phpCAS::trace("Client: ".$client."/".$client_ip);
01308                         $allowed = false;
01309                         foreach ($allowed_clients as $allowed_client) {
01310                                 if (($client == $allowed_client) or ($client_ip == $allowed_client)) {
01311                                         phpCAS::trace("Allowed client '".$allowed_client."' matches, logout request is allowed");
01312                                         $allowed = true;
01313                                         break;
01314                                 } else {
01315                                         phpCAS::trace("Allowed client '".$allowed_client."' does not match");
01316                                 }
01317                         }
01318                         if (!$allowed) {
01319                                 phpCAS::error("Unauthorized logout request from client '".$client."'");
01320                                 printf("Unauthorized!");
01321                                 phpCAS::traceExit();
01322                                 exit();
01323                         }
01324                 } else {
01325                         phpCAS::trace("No access control set");
01326                 }
01327                 // Extract the ticket from the SAML Request
01328                 preg_match("|<samlp:SessionIndex>(.*)</samlp:SessionIndex>|", $_POST['logoutRequest'], $tick, PREG_OFFSET_CAPTURE, 3);
01329                 $wrappedSamlSessionIndex = preg_replace('|<samlp:SessionIndex>|','',$tick[0][0]);
01330                 $ticket2logout = preg_replace('|</samlp:SessionIndex>|','',$wrappedSamlSessionIndex);
01331                 phpCAS::trace("Ticket to logout: ".$ticket2logout);
01332                 
01333                 // call the post-authenticate callback if registered.
01334                 if ($this->_signoutCallbackFunction) {
01335                         $args = $this->_signoutCallbackArgs;
01336                         array_unshift($args, $ticket2logout);
01337                         call_user_func_array($this->_signoutCallbackFunction, $args);
01338                 }
01339                 
01340                 // If phpCAS is managing the session, destroy it.
01341                 if ($this->_start_session) {
01342                         $session_id = preg_replace('/[^\w]/','',$ticket2logout);
01343                         phpCAS::trace("Session id: ".$session_id);
01344         
01345                         // destroy a possible application session created before phpcas
01346                         if(session_id() !== ""){
01347                                 session_unset();
01348                                 session_destroy();
01349                         }
01350                         // fix session ID
01351                         session_id($session_id);
01352                         $_COOKIE[session_name()]=$session_id;
01353                         $_GET[session_name()]=$session_id;
01354         
01355                         // Overwrite session
01356                         session_start();
01357                         session_unset();
01358                         session_destroy();
01359                 }
01360                 
01361                 printf("Disconnected!");
01362                 phpCAS::traceExit();
01363                 exit();
01364         }

01414         // ########################################################################
01415         //  ST VALIDATION
01416         // ########################################################################
01427         private $_cas_server_ca_cert = '';
01428 
01434         private $_no_cas_server_validation = false;
01435 
01436 
01442         public function setCasServerCACert($cert)
01443         {
01444                 $this->_cas_server_ca_cert = $cert;
01445         }

01451         {
01452                 $this->_no_cas_server_validation = true;

01454 
01466         public function validateST($validate_url,&$text_response,&$tree_response)
01467         {
01468                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
01469                 // build the URL to validate the ticket
01470                 $validate_url = $this->getServerServiceValidateURL().'&ticket='.$this->getST();
01471                 if ( $this->isProxy() ) {
01472                         // pass the callback url for CAS proxies
01473                         $validate_url .= '&pgtUrl='.urlencode($this->getCallbackURL());
01474                 }
01475 
01476                 // open and read the URL
01477                 if ( !$this->readURL($validate_url,array(),$headers,$text_response,$err_msg) ) {
01478                         phpCAS::trace('could not open URL \''.$validate_url.'\' to validate ('.$err_msg.')');
01479                         $this->authError('ST not validated',
01480                         $validate_url,
01481                         TRUE/*$no_response*/);
01482                 }
01483 
01484                 // analyze the result depending on the version
01485                 switch ($this->getServerVersion()) {
01486                         case CAS_VERSION_1_0:
01487                                 if (preg_match('/^no\n/',$text_response)) {
01488                                         phpCAS::trace('ST has not been validated');
01489                                         $this->authError('ST not validated',
01490                                         $validate_url,
01491                                         FALSE/*$no_response*/,
01492                                         FALSE/*$bad_response*/,
01493                                         $text_response);
01494                                 }
01495                                 if (!preg_match('/^yes\n/',$text_response)) {
01496                                         phpCAS::trace('ill-formed response');
01497                                         $this->authError('ST not validated',
01498                                         $validate_url,
01499                                         FALSE/*$no_response*/,
01500                                         TRUE/*$bad_response*/,
01501                                         $text_response);
01502                                 }
01503                                 // ST has been validated, extract the user name
01504                                 $arr = preg_split('/\n/',$text_response);
01505                                 $this->setUser(trim($arr[1]));
01506                                 break;
01507                         case CAS_VERSION_2_0:
01508 
01509                                 // create new DOMDocument object
01510                                 $dom = new DOMDocument();
01511                                 // Fix possible whitspace problems
01512                                 $dom->preserveWhiteSpace = false;
01513                                 // read the response of the CAS server into a DOM object
01514                                 if ( !($dom->loadXML($text_response))) {
01515                                         phpCAS::trace('dom->loadXML() failed');
01516                                         $this->authError('ST not validated',
01517                                         $validate_url,
01518                                         FALSE/*$no_response*/,
01519                                         TRUE/*$bad_response*/,
01520                                         $text_response);
01521                                 }
01522                                 // read the root node of the XML tree
01523                                 if ( !($tree_response = $dom->documentElement) ) {
01524                                         phpCAS::trace('documentElement() failed');
01525                                         $this->authError('ST not validated',
01526                                         $validate_url,
01527                                         FALSE/*$no_response*/,
01528                                         TRUE/*$bad_response*/,
01529                                         $text_response);
01530                                 }
01531                                 // insure that tag name is 'serviceResponse'
01532                                 if ( $tree_response->localName != 'serviceResponse' ) {
01533                                         phpCAS::trace('bad XML root node (should be `serviceResponse\' instead of `'.$tree_response->localName.'\'');
01534                                         $this->authError('ST not validated',
01535                                         $validate_url,
01536                                         FALSE/*$no_response*/,
01537                                         TRUE/*$bad_response*/,
01538                                         $text_response);
01539                                 }
01540 
01541                                 if ( $tree_response->getElementsByTagName("authenticationSuccess")->length != 0) {
01542                                         // authentication succeded, extract the user name
01543                                         $success_elements = $tree_response->getElementsByTagName("authenticationSuccess");
01544                                         if ( $success_elements->item(0)->getElementsByTagName("user")->length == 0) {
01545                                                 // no user specified => error
01546                                                 $this->authError('ST not validated',
01547                                                 $validate_url,
01548                                                 FALSE/*$no_response*/,
01549                                                 TRUE/*$bad_response*/,
01550                                                 $text_response);
01551                                         }
01552                                         $this->setUser(trim($success_elements->item(0)->getElementsByTagName("user")->item(0)->nodeValue));
01553                                         $this->readExtraAttributesCas20($success_elements);
01554                                 } else if ( $tree_response->getElementsByTagName("authenticationFailure")->length != 0) {
01555                                         phpCAS::trace('<authenticationFailure> found');
01556                                         // authentication failed, extract the error code and message
01557                                         $auth_fail_list = $tree_response->getElementsByTagName("authenticationFailure");
01558                                         $this->authError('ST not validated',
01559                                         $validate_url,
01560                                         FALSE/*$no_response*/,
01561                                         FALSE/*$bad_response*/,
01562                                         $text_response,
01563                                         $auth_fail_list->item(0)->getAttribute('code')/*$err_code*/,
01564                                         trim($auth_fail_list->item(0)->nodeValue)/*$err_msg*/);
01565                                 } else {
01566                                         phpCAS::trace('neither <authenticationSuccess> nor <authenticationFailure> found');
01567                                         $this->authError('ST not validated',
01568                                         $validate_url,
01569                                         FALSE/*$no_response*/,
01570                                         TRUE/*$bad_response*/,
01571                                         $text_response);
01572                                 }
01573                                 break;
01574                 }
01575                 $this->renameSession($this->getST());
01576                 // at this step, ST has been validated and $this->_user has been set,
01577                 phpCAS::traceEnd(TRUE);
01578                 return TRUE;
01579         }
01580 
01581 
01589         private function readExtraAttributesCas20($success_elements)
01590         {
01591                 # PHPCAS-43 add CAS-2.0 extra attributes
01592                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
01593 
01594                 $extra_attributes = array();
01595                 
01596                 // "Jasig Style" Attributes:
01597                 // 
01598                 //      <cas:serviceResponse xmlns:cas='http://www.yale.edu/tp/cas'>
01599                 //              <cas:authenticationSuccess>
01600                 //                      <cas:user>jsmith</cas:user>
01601                 //                      <cas:attributes>
01602                 //                              <cas:attraStyle>RubyCAS</cas:attraStyle>
01603                 //                              <cas:surname>Smith</cas:surname>
01604                 //                              <cas:givenName>John</cas:givenName>
01605                 //                              <cas:memberOf>CN=Staff,OU=Groups,DC=example,DC=edu</cas:memberOf>
01606                 //                              <cas:memberOf>CN=Spanish Department,OU=Departments,OU=Groups,DC=example,DC=edu</cas:memberOf>
01607                 //                      </cas:attributes>
01608                 //                      <cas:proxyGrantingTicket>PGTIOU-84678-8a9d2sfa23casd</cas:proxyGrantingTicket>
01609                 //              </cas:authenticationSuccess>
01610                 //      </cas:serviceResponse>
01611                 // 
01612                 if ( $success_elements->item(0)->getElementsByTagName("attributes")->length != 0) {
01613                         $attr_nodes = $success_elements->item(0)->getElementsByTagName("attributes");
01614                         phpCas :: trace("Found nested jasig style attributes");
01615                         if($attr_nodes->item(0)->hasChildNodes()){
01616                                 // Nested Attributes
01617                                 foreach ($attr_nodes->item(0)->childNodes as $attr_child) {
01618                                         phpCas :: trace("Attribute [".$attr_child->localName."] = ".$attr_child->nodeValue);
01619                                         $this->addAttributeToArray($extra_attributes, $attr_child->localName, $attr_child->nodeValue);
01620                                 }
01621                         }
01622                 } 
01623                 // "RubyCAS Style" attributes
01624                 // 
01625                 //      <cas:serviceResponse xmlns:cas='http://www.yale.edu/tp/cas'>
01626                 //              <cas:authenticationSuccess>
01627                 //                      <cas:user>jsmith</cas:user>
01628                 //                      
01629                 //                      <cas:attraStyle>RubyCAS</cas:attraStyle>
01630                 //                      <cas:surname>Smith</cas:surname>
01631                 //                      <cas:givenName>John</cas:givenName>
01632                 //                      <cas:memberOf>CN=Staff,OU=Groups,DC=example,DC=edu</cas:memberOf>
01633                 //                      <cas:memberOf>CN=Spanish Department,OU=Departments,OU=Groups,DC=example,DC=edu</cas:memberOf>
01634                 //                      
01635                 //                      <cas:proxyGrantingTicket>PGTIOU-84678-8a9d2sfa23casd</cas:proxyGrantingTicket>
01636                 //              </cas:authenticationSuccess>
01637                 //      </cas:serviceResponse>
01638                 // 
01639                 else {
01640                         phpCas :: trace("Testing for rubycas style attributes");
01641                         $childnodes = $success_elements->item(0)->childNodes;
01642                         foreach ($childnodes as $attr_node) {
01643                                 switch ($attr_node->localName) {
01644                                         case 'user':
01645                                         case 'proxies':
01646                                         case 'proxyGrantingTicket':
01647                                                 continue;
01648                                         default:
01649                                                 if (strlen(trim($attr_node->nodeValue))) {
01650                                                         phpCas :: trace("Attribute [".$attr_node->localName."] = ".$attr_node->nodeValue);
01651                                                         $this->addAttributeToArray($extra_attributes, $attr_node->localName, $attr_node->nodeValue);
01652                                                 }
01653                                 }
01654                         }
01655                 }
01656                 
01657                 // "Name-Value" attributes.
01658                 // 
01659                 // Attribute format from these mailing list thread:
01660                 // http://jasig.275507.n4.nabble.com/CAS-attributes-and-how-they-appear-in-the-CAS-response-td264272.html
01661                 // Note: This is a less widely used format, but in use by at least two institutions.
01662                 // 
01663                 //      <cas:serviceResponse xmlns:cas='http://www.yale.edu/tp/cas'>
01664                 //              <cas:authenticationSuccess>
01665                 //                      <cas:user>jsmith</cas:user>
01666                 //                      
01667                 //                      <cas:attribute name='attraStyle' value='Name-Value' />
01668                 //                      <cas:attribute name='surname' value='Smith' />
01669                 //                      <cas:attribute name='givenName' value='John' />
01670                 //                      <cas:attribute name='memberOf' value='CN=Staff,OU=Groups,DC=example,DC=edu' />
01671                 //                      <cas:attribute name='memberOf' value='CN=Spanish Department,OU=Departments,OU=Groups,DC=example,DC=edu' />
01672                 //                      
01673                 //                      <cas:proxyGrantingTicket>PGTIOU-84678-8a9d2sfa23casd</cas:proxyGrantingTicket>
01674                 //              </cas:authenticationSuccess>
01675                 //      </cas:serviceResponse>
01676                 // 
01677                 if (!count($extra_attributes) && $success_elements->item(0)->getElementsByTagName("attribute")->length != 0) {
01678                         $attr_nodes = $success_elements->item(0)->getElementsByTagName("attribute");
01679                         $firstAttr = $attr_nodes->item(0);
01680                         if (!$firstAttr->hasChildNodes() && $firstAttr->hasAttribute('name') && $firstAttr->hasAttribute('value')) {
01681                                 phpCas :: trace("Found Name-Value style attributes");
01682                                 // Nested Attributes
01683                                 foreach ($attr_nodes as $attr_node) {
01684                                         if ($attr_node->hasAttribute('name') && $attr_node->hasAttribute('value')) {
01685                                                 phpCas :: trace("Attribute [".$attr_node->getAttribute('name')."] = ".$attr_node->getAttribute('value'));
01686                                                 $this->addAttributeToArray($extra_attributes, $attr_node->getAttribute('name'), $attr_node->getAttribute('value'));
01687                                         }
01688                                 }
01689                         }
01690                 }
01691                 
01692                 $this->setAttributes($extra_attributes);
01693                 phpCAS::traceEnd();
01694                 return TRUE;
01695         }
01696         
01705         private function addAttributeToArray (array &$attributeArray, $name, $value) {
01706                 // If multiple attributes exist, add as an array value
01707                 if (isset($attributeArray[$name])) {
01708                         // Initialize the array with the existing value
01709                         if (!is_array($attributeArray[$name])) {
01710                                 $existingValue = $attributeArray[$name];
01711                                 $attributeArray[$name] = array($existingValue);
01712                         }
01713                         
01714                         $attributeArray[$name][] = trim($value);
01715                 } else {
01716                         $attributeArray[$name] = trim($value);
01717                 }
01718         }
01719         
01720         // ########################################################################
01721         //  SAML VALIDATION
01722         // ########################################################################
01739         public function validateSA($validate_url,&$text_response,&$tree_response)
01740         {
01741                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
01742 
01743                 // build the URL to validate the ticket
01744                 $validate_url = $this->getServerSamlValidateURL();
01745 
01746                 // open and read the URL
01747                 if ( !$this->readURL($validate_url,array(),$headers,$text_response,$err_msg) ) {
01748                         phpCAS::trace('could not open URL \''.$validate_url.'\' to validate ('.$err_msg.')');
01749                         $this->authError('SA not validated', $validate_url, TRUE/*$no_response*/);
01750                 }
01751 
01752                 phpCAS::trace('server version: '.$this->getServerVersion());
01753 
01754                 // analyze the result depending on the version
01755                 switch ($this->getServerVersion()) {
01756                         case SAML_VERSION_1_1:
01757 
01758                                 // create new DOMDocument Object
01759                                 $dom = new DOMDocument();
01760                                 // Fix possible whitspace problems
01761                                 $dom->preserveWhiteSpace = false;
01762                                 // read the response of the CAS server into a DOM object
01763                                 if ( !($dom->loadXML($text_response))) {
01764                                         phpCAS::trace('dom->loadXML() failed');
01765                                         $this->authError('SA not validated',
01766                                         $validate_url,
01767                                         FALSE/*$no_response*/,
01768                                         TRUE/*$bad_response*/,
01769                                         $text_response);
01770                                 }
01771                                 // read the root node of the XML tree
01772                                 if ( !($tree_response = $dom->documentElement) ) {
01773                                         phpCAS::trace('documentElement() failed');
01774                                         $this->authError('SA not validated',
01775                                         $validate_url,
01776                                         FALSE/*$no_response*/,
01777                                         TRUE/*$bad_response*/,
01778                                         $text_response);
01779                                 }
01780                                 // insure that tag name is 'Envelope'
01781                                 if ( $tree_response->localName != 'Envelope' ) {
01782                                         phpCAS::trace('bad XML root node (should be `Envelope\' instead of `'.$tree_response->localName.'\'');
01783                                         $this->authError('SA not validated',
01784                                         $validate_url,
01785                                         FALSE/*$no_response*/,
01786                                         TRUE/*$bad_response*/,
01787                                         $text_response);
01788                                 }
01789                                 // check for the NameIdentifier tag in the SAML response
01790                                 if ( $tree_response->getElementsByTagName("NameIdentifier")->length != 0) {
01791                                         $success_elements = $tree_response->getElementsByTagName("NameIdentifier");
01792                                         phpCAS::trace('NameIdentifier found');
01793                                         $user = trim($success_elements->item(0)->nodeValue);
01794                                         phpCAS::trace('user = `'.$user.'`');
01795                                         $this->setUser($user);
01796                                         $this->setSessionAttributes($text_response);
01797                                 } else {
01798                                         phpCAS::trace('no <NameIdentifier> tag found in SAML payload');
01799                                         $this->authError('SA not validated',
01800                                         $validate_url,
01801                                         FALSE/*$no_response*/,
01802                                         TRUE/*$bad_response*/,
01803                                         $text_response);
01804                                 }
01805                                 break;
01806                 }
01807                 $this->renameSession($this->getSA());
01808                 // at this step, ST has been validated and $this->_user has been set,
01809                 phpCAS::traceEnd(TRUE);
01810                 return TRUE;
01811         }
01812 
01820         private function setSessionAttributes($text_response)
01821         {
01822                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
01823 
01824                 $result = FALSE;
01825 
01826                 $attr_array = array();
01827 
01828                 // create new DOMDocument Object
01829                 $dom = new DOMDocument();
01830                 // Fix possible whitspace problems
01831                 $dom->preserveWhiteSpace = false;
01832                 if (($dom->loadXML($text_response))) {
01833                         $xPath = new DOMXpath($dom);
01834                         $xPath->registerNamespace('samlp', 'urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:protocol');
01835                         $xPath->registerNamespace('saml', 'urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:assertion');
01836                         $nodelist = $xPath->query("//saml:Attribute");
01837 
01838                         if($nodelist){
01839                                 foreach($nodelist as $node){
01840                                         $xres = $xPath->query("saml:AttributeValue", $node);
01841                                         $name = $node->getAttribute("AttributeName");
01842                                         $value_array = array();
01843                                         foreach($xres as $node2){
01844                                                 $value_array[] = $node2->nodeValue;
01845                                         }
01846                                         $attr_array[$name] = $value_array;
01847                                 }
01848                                 // UGent addition...
01849                                 foreach($attr_array as $attr_key => $attr_value) {
01850                                         if(count($attr_value) > 1) {
01851                                                 $this->_attributes[$attr_key] = $attr_value;
01852                                                 phpCAS::trace("* " . $attr_key . "=" . $attr_value);
01853                                         }
01854                                         else {
01855                                                 $this->_attributes[$attr_key] = $attr_value[0];
01856                                                 phpCAS::trace("* " . $attr_key . "=" . $attr_value[0]);
01857                                         }
01858                                 }
01859                                 $result = TRUE;
01860                         }else{
01861                                 phpCAS::trace("SAML Attributes are empty");
01862                                 $result = FALSE;
01863                         }
01864                 }
01865                 phpCAS::traceEnd($result);
01866                 return $result;
01867         }

01995         private $_callback_url = '';
01996 
02004         private function getCallbackURL()
02005         {
02006                 // the URL is built when needed only
02007                 if ( empty($this->_callback_url) ) {
02008                         $final_uri = '';
02009                         // remove the ticket if present in the URL
02010                         $final_uri = 'https://';
02011                         $final_uri .= $this->getServerUrl();
02012                         $request_uri = $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'];
02013                         $request_uri = preg_replace('/\?.*$/','',$request_uri);
02014                         $final_uri .= $request_uri;
02015                         $this->setCallbackURL($final_uri);
02016                 }
02017                 return $this->_callback_url;
02018         }

02025         public function setCallbackURL($url)
02026         {
02027                 return $this->_callback_url = $url;

02029 
02034         private function callback()
02035         {
02036                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
02037                 if (preg_match('/PGTIOU-[\.\-\w]/', $_GET['pgtIou'])){
02038                         if(preg_match('/[PT]GT-[\.\-\w]/', $_GET['pgtId'])){
02039                                 $this->printHTMLHeader('phpCAS callback');
02040                                 $pgt_iou = $_GET['pgtIou'];
02041                                 $pgt = $_GET['pgtId'];
02042                                 phpCAS::trace('Storing PGT `'.$pgt.'\' (id=`'.$pgt_iou.'\')');
02043                                 echo '<p>Storing PGT `'.$pgt.'\' (id=`'.$pgt_iou.'\').</p>';
02044                                 $this->storePGT($pgt,$pgt_iou);
02045                                 $this->printHTMLFooter();
02046                         }else{
02047                                 phpCAS::error('PGT format invalid' . $_GET['pgtId']);
02048                         }
02049                 }else{
02050                         phpCAS::error('PGTiou format invalid' . $_GET['pgtIou']);
02051                 }
02052                 phpCAS::traceExit();
02053                 exit();
02054         }
02055 
02058         // ########################################################################
02059         //  PGT STORAGE
02060         // ########################################################################
02073         private $_pgt_storage = null;
02074 
02079         private function initPGTStorage()
02080         {
02081                 // if no SetPGTStorageXxx() has been used, default to file
02082                 if ( !is_object($this->_pgt_storage) ) {
02083                         $this->setPGTStorageFile();
02084                 }
02085 
02086                 // initializes the storage
02087                 $this->_pgt_storage->init();
02088         }
02089 
02096         private function storePGT($pgt,$pgt_iou)
02097         {
02098                 // ensure that storage is initialized
02099                 $this->initPGTStorage();
02100                 // writes the PGT
02101                 $this->_pgt_storage->write($pgt,$pgt_iou);
02102         }
02103 
02111         private function loadPGT($pgt_iou)
02112         {
02113                 // ensure that storage is initialized
02114                 $this->initPGTStorage();
02115                 // read the PGT
02116                 return $this->_pgt_storage->read($pgt_iou);
02117         }
02118 
02126         public function setPGTStorageFile($format='',
02127         $path='')
02128         {
02129                 // check that the storage has not already been set
02130                 if ( is_object($this->_pgt_storage) ) {
02131                         phpCAS::error('PGT storage already defined');
02132                 }
02133 
02134                 // create the storage object
02135                 $this->_pgt_storage = new CAS_PGTStorageFile($this,$format,$path);
02136         }
