02138 
02139         // ########################################################################
02140         //  PGT VALIDATION
02141         // ########################################################################
02153         private function validatePGT(&$validate_url,$text_response,$tree_response)
02154         {
02155                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
02156                 if ( $tree_response->getElementsByTagName("proxyGrantingTicket")->length == 0) {
02157                         phpCAS::trace('<proxyGrantingTicket> not found');
02158                         // authentication succeded, but no PGT Iou was transmitted
02159                         $this->authError('Ticket validated but no PGT Iou transmitted',
02160                         $validate_url,
02161                         FALSE/*$no_response*/,
02162                         FALSE/*$bad_response*/,
02163                         $text_response);
02164                 } else {
02165                         // PGT Iou transmitted, extract it
02166                         $pgt_iou = trim($tree_response->getElementsByTagName("proxyGrantingTicket")->item(0)->nodeValue);
02167                         if(preg_match('/PGTIOU-[\.\-\w]/',$pgt_iou)){
02168                                 $pgt = $this->loadPGT($pgt_iou);
02169                                 if ( $pgt == FALSE ) {
02170                                         phpCAS::trace('could not load PGT');
02171                                         $this->authError('PGT Iou was transmitted but PGT could not be retrieved',
02172                                         $validate_url,
02173                                         FALSE/*$no_response*/,
02174                                         FALSE/*$bad_response*/,
02175                                         $text_response);
02176                                 }
02177                                 $this->setPGT($pgt);
02178                         }else{
02179                                 phpCAS::trace('PGTiou format error');
02180                                 $this->authError('PGT Iou was transmitted but has wrong fromat',
02181                                 $validate_url,
02182                                 FALSE/*$no_response*/,
02183                                 FALSE/*$bad_response*/,
02184                                 $text_response);
02185                         }
02186                 }
02187                 phpCAS::traceEnd(TRUE);
02188                 return TRUE;
02189         }
02190 
02191         // ########################################################################
02192         //  PGT VALIDATION
02193         // ########################################################################
02194 
02204         private function retrievePT($target_service,&$err_code,&$err_msg)
02205         {
02206                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
02207 
02208                 // by default, $err_msg is set empty and $pt to TRUE. On error, $pt is
02209                 // set to false and $err_msg to an error message. At the end, if $pt is FALSE
02210                 // and $error_msg is still empty, it is set to 'invalid response' (the most
02211                 // commonly encountered error).
02212                 $err_msg = '';
02213 
02214                 // build the URL to retrieve the PT
02215                 $cas_url = $this->getServerProxyURL().'?targetService='.urlencode($target_service).'&pgt='.$this->getPGT();
02216 
02217                 // open and read the URL
02218                 if ( !$this->readURL($cas_url,array(),$headers,$cas_response,$err_msg) ) {
02219                         phpCAS::trace('could not open URL \''.$cas_url.'\' to validate ('.$err_msg.')');
02220                         $err_code = PHPCAS_SERVICE_PT_NO_SERVER_RESPONSE;
02221                         $err_msg = 'could not retrieve PT (no response from the CAS server)';
02222                         phpCAS::traceEnd(FALSE);
02223                         return FALSE;
02224                 }
02225 
02226                 $bad_response = FALSE;
02227 
02228                 if ( !$bad_response ) {
02229                         // create new DOMDocument object
02230                         $dom = new DOMDocument();
02231                         // Fix possible whitspace problems
02232                         $dom->preserveWhiteSpace = false;
02233                         // read the response of the CAS server into a DOM object
02234                         if ( !($dom->loadXML($cas_response))) {
02235                                 phpCAS::trace('dom->loadXML() failed');
02236                                 // read failed
02237                                 $bad_response = TRUE;
02238                         }
02239                 }
02240 
02241                 if ( !$bad_response ) {
02242                         // read the root node of the XML tree
02243                         if ( !($root = $dom->documentElement) ) {
02244                                 phpCAS::trace('documentElement failed');
02245                                 // read failed
02246                                 $bad_response = TRUE;
02247                         }
02248                 }
02249 
02250                 if ( !$bad_response ) {
02251                         // insure that tag name is 'serviceResponse'
02252                         if ( $root->localName != 'serviceResponse' ) {
02253                                 phpCAS::trace('localName failed');
02254                                 // bad root node
02255                                 $bad_response = TRUE;
02256                         }
02257                 }
02258 
02259                 if ( !$bad_response ) {
02260                         // look for a proxySuccess tag
02261                         if ( $root->getElementsByTagName("proxySuccess")->length != 0) {
02262                                 $proxy_success_list = $root->getElementsByTagName("proxySuccess");
02263 
02264                                 // authentication succeded, look for a proxyTicket tag
02265                                 if ( $proxy_success_list->item(0)->getElementsByTagName("proxyTicket")->length != 0) {
02266                                         $err_code = PHPCAS_SERVICE_OK;
02267                                         $err_msg = '';
02268                                         $pt = trim($proxy_success_list->item(0)->getElementsByTagName("proxyTicket")->item(0)->nodeValue);
02269                                         phpCAS::trace('original PT: '.trim($pt));
02270                                         phpCAS::traceEnd($pt);
02271                                         return $pt;
02272                                 } else {
02273                                         phpCAS::trace('<proxySuccess> was found, but not <proxyTicket>');
02274                                 }
02275                         }
02276                         // look for a proxyFailure tag
02277                         else if ( $root->getElementsByTagName("proxyFailure")->length != 0) {
02278                                 $proxy_failure_list = $root->getElementsByTagName("proxyFailure");
02279 
02280                                 // authentication failed, extract the error
02281                                 $err_code = PHPCAS_SERVICE_PT_FAILURE;
02282                                 $err_msg = 'PT retrieving failed (code=`'
02283                                 .$proxy_failure_list->item(0)->getAttribute('code')
02284                                 .'\', message=`'
02285                                 .trim($proxy_failure_list->item(0)->nodeValue)
02286                                 .'\')';
02287                                 phpCAS::traceEnd(FALSE);
02288                                 return FALSE;
02289                         } else {
02290                                 phpCAS::trace('neither <proxySuccess> nor <proxyFailure> found');
02291                         }
02292                 }
02293 
02294                 // at this step, we are sure that the response of the CAS server was ill-formed
02295                 $err_code = PHPCAS_SERVICE_PT_BAD_SERVER_RESPONSE;
02296                 $err_msg = 'Invalid response from the CAS server (response=`'.$cas_response.'\')';
02297 
02298                 phpCAS::traceEnd(FALSE);
02299                 return FALSE;
02300         }
02301 
02302         // ########################################################################
02303         // ACCESS TO EXTERNAL SERVICES
02304         // ########################################################################
02305 
02319         private function readURL($url, array $cookies, &$headers, &$body, &$err_msg)
02320         {
02321                 $className = $this->_requestImplementation;
02322                 $request = new $className();
02323 
02324                 if (count($this->_curl_options)) {
02325                         $request->setCurlOptions($this->_curl_options);
02326                 }
02327 
02328                 $request->setUrl($url);
02329                 $request->addCookies($cookies);
02330 
02331                 if (empty($this->_cas_server_ca_cert) && !$this->_no_cas_server_validation) {
02332                         phpCAS::error('one of the methods phpCAS::setCasServerCACert() or phpCAS::setNoCasServerValidation() must be called.');
02333                 }
02334                 if ($this->_cas_server_ca_cert != '') {
02335                         $request->setSslCaCert($this->_cas_server_ca_cert);
02336                 }
02337 
02338                 // add extra stuff if SAML
02339                 if ($this->hasSA()) {
02340                         $request->addHeader("soapaction: http://www.oasis-open.org/committees/security");
02341                         $request->addHeader("cache-control: no-cache");
02342                         $request->addHeader("pragma: no-cache");
02343                         $request->addHeader("accept: text/xml");
02344                         $request->addHeader("connection: keep-alive");
02345                         $request->addHeader("content-type: text/xml");
02346                         $request->makePost();
02347                         $request->setPostBody($this->buildSAMLPayload());
02348                 }
02349 
02350                 if ($request->send()) {
02351                         $headers = $request->getResponseHeaders();
02352                         $body = $request->getResponseBody();
02353                         $err_msg = '';
02354                         return true;
02355                 } else {
02356                         $headers = '';
02357                         $body = '';
02358                         $err_msg = $request->getErrorMessage();
02359                         return false;
02360                 }
02361         }
02362 
02368         private function buildSAMLPayload()
02369         {
02370                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
02371 
02372                 //get the ticket
02373                 $sa = $this->getSA();
02374 
02375                 $body=SAML_SOAP_ENV.SAML_SOAP_BODY.SAMLP_REQUEST.SAML_ASSERTION_ARTIFACT.$sa.SAML_ASSERTION_ARTIFACT_CLOSE.SAMLP_REQUEST_CLOSE.SAML_SOAP_BODY_CLOSE.SAML_SOAP_ENV_CLOSE;
02376 
02377                 phpCAS::traceEnd($body);
02378                 return ($body);
02379         }
02380 
02381         private  $_curl_headers = array();
02385         public function _curl_read_headers($ch, $header)
02386         {
02387                 $this->_curl_headers[] = $header;
02388                 return strlen($header);
02389         }
02390 
02404         public function serviceWeb($url,&$err_code,&$output)
02405         {
02406                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
02407                 $cookies = array();
02408                 // at first retrieve a PT
02409                 $pt = $this->retrievePT($url,$err_code,$ptoutput);
02410 
02411                 $res = TRUE;
02412 
02413                 // test if PT was retrieved correctly
02414                 if ( !$pt ) {
02415                         // note: $err_code and $err_msg are filled by CASClient::retrievePT()
02416                         phpCAS::trace('PT was not retrieved correctly');
02417                         $res = FALSE;
02418                 } else {
02419                         // add cookies if necessary
02420                         $cookies = array();
02421                         foreach ( $this->_serviceCookieJar->getCookies($url) as $name => $val ) {
02422                                 $cookies[] = $name.'='.$val;
02423                         }
02424                                 
02425                         // build the URL including the PT
02426                         if ( strstr($url,'?') === FALSE ) {
02427                                 $service_url = $url.'?ticket='.$pt;
02428                         } else {
02429                                 $service_url = $url.'&ticket='.$pt;
02430                         }
02431                         phpCAS::trace('reading URL`'.$service_url.'\'');
02432                         if ( !$this->readURL($service_url,$cookies,$headers,$output,$err_msg) ) {
02433                                 phpCAS::trace('could not read URL`'.$service_url.'\'');
02434                                 $err_code = PHPCAS_SERVICE_NOT_AVAILABLE;
02435                                 // give an error message
02436                                 $output = sprintf($this->getString(CAS_STR_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE),
02437                                 $service_url,
02438                                 $err_msg);
02439                                 $res = FALSE;
02440                         } else {
02441                                 // URL has been fetched, extract the cookies
02442                                 phpCAS::trace('URL`'.$service_url.'\' has been read, storing cookies:');
02443                                 $this->_serviceCookieJar->storeCookies($service_url, $headers);
02444                         }
02445                         // Check for the redirect after authentication
02446                         foreach($headers as $header){
02447                                 if (preg_match('/(Location:|URI:)(.*?)\n/', $header, $matches))
02448                                 {
02449                                         $redirect_url = trim(array_pop($matches));
02450                                         phpCAS :: trace('Found redirect:'.$redirect_url);
02451                                         $cookies = array();
02452                                         foreach ( $this->_serviceCookieJar->getCookies($redirect_url) as $name => $val ) {
02453                                                 $cookies[] = $name.'='.$val;
02454                                         }
02455                                         phpCAS::trace('reading URL`'.$redirect_url.'\'');
02456                                         if ( !$this->readURL($redirect_url,$cookies,$headers,$output,$err_msg) ) {
02457                                                 phpCAS::trace('could not read URL`'.$redirect_url.'\'');
02458                                                 $err_code = PHPCAS_SERVICE_NOT_AVAILABLE;
02459                                                 // give an error message
02460                                                 $output = sprintf($this->getString(CAS_STR_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE),
02461                                                 $service_url,
02462                                                 $err_msg);
02463                                                 $res = FALSE;
02464                                         } else {
02465                                                 // URL has been fetched, extract the cookies
02466                                                 phpCAS::trace('URL`'.$redirect_url.'\' has been read, storing cookies:');
02467                                                 $this->_serviceCookieJar->storeCookies($redirect_url, $headers);
02468                                         }
02469                                         break;
02470                                 }
02471 
02472                         }
02473                 }
02474 
02475                 phpCAS::traceEnd($res);
02476                 return $res;
02477         }
02478 
02496         public function serviceMail($url,$service,$flags,&$err_code,&$err_msg,&$pt)
02497         {
02498                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
02499                 // at first retrieve a PT
02500                 $pt = $this->retrievePT($service,$err_code,$ptoutput);
02501 
02502                 $stream = FALSE;
02503 
02504                 // test if PT was retrieved correctly
02505                 if ( !$pt ) {
02506                         // note: $err_code and $err_msg are filled by CASClient::retrievePT()
02507                         phpCAS::trace('PT was not retrieved correctly');
02508                 } else {
02509                         phpCAS::trace('opening IMAP URL `'.$url.'\'...');
02510                         $stream = @imap_open($url,$this->getUser(),$pt,$flags);
02511                         if ( !$stream ) {
02512                                 phpCAS::trace('could not open URL');
02513                                 $err_code = PHPCAS_SERVICE_NOT_AVAILABLE;
02514                                 // give an error message
02515                                 $err_msg = sprintf($this->getString(CAS_STR_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE),
02516                                 $url,
02517                                 var_export(imap_errors(),TRUE));
02518                                 $pt = FALSE;
02519                                 $stream = FALSE;
02520                         } else {
02521                                 phpCAS::trace('ok');
02522                         }
02523                 }
02524 
02525                 phpCAS::traceEnd($stream);
02526                 return $stream;
02527         }
02528

02637         // ########################################################################
02638         //  PT VALIDATION
02639         // ########################################################################
02650         public function validatePT(&$validate_url,&$text_response,&$tree_response)
02651         {
02652                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
02653                 phpCAS::trace($text_response);
02654                 // build the URL to validate the ticket
02655                 $validate_url = $this->getServerProxyValidateURL().'&ticket='.$this->getPT();
02656 
02657                 if ( $this->isProxy() ) {
02658                         // pass the callback url for CAS proxies
02659                         $validate_url .= '&pgtUrl='.urlencode($this->getCallbackURL());
02660                 }
02661 
02662                 // open and read the URL
02663                 if ( !$this->readURL($validate_url,array(),$headers,$text_response,$err_msg) ) {
02664                         phpCAS::trace('could not open URL \''.$validate_url.'\' to validate ('.$err_msg.')');
02665                         $this->authError('PT not validated',
02666                         $validate_url,
02667                         TRUE/*$no_response*/);
02668                 }
02669 
02670                 // create new DOMDocument object
02671                 $dom = new DOMDocument();
02672                 // Fix possible whitspace problems
02673                 $dom->preserveWhiteSpace = false;
02674                 // read the response of the CAS server into a DOMDocument object
02675                 if ( !($dom->loadXML($text_response))) {
02676                         // read failed
02677                         $this->authError('PT not validated',
02678                         $validate_url,
02679                         FALSE/*$no_response*/,
02680                         TRUE/*$bad_response*/,
02681                         $text_response);
02682                 }
02683 
02684                 // read the root node of the XML tree
02685                 if ( !($tree_response = $dom->documentElement) ) {
02686                         // read failed
02687                         $this->authError('PT not validated',
02688                         $validate_url,
02689                         FALSE/*$no_response*/,
02690                         TRUE/*$bad_response*/,
02691                         $text_response);
02692                 }
02693                 // insure that tag name is 'serviceResponse'
02694                 if ( $tree_response->localName != 'serviceResponse' ) {
02695                         // bad root node
02696                         $this->authError('PT not validated',
02697                         $validate_url,
02698                         FALSE/*$no_response*/,
02699                         TRUE/*$bad_response*/,
02700                         $text_response);
02701                 }
02702                 if ( $tree_response->getElementsByTagName("authenticationSuccess")->length != 0) {
02703                         // authentication succeded, extract the user name
02704                         $success_elements = $tree_response->getElementsByTagName("authenticationSuccess");
02705                         if ( $success_elements->item(0)->getElementsByTagName("user")->length == 0) {
02706                                 // no user specified => error
02707                                 $this->authError('PT not validated',
02708                                 $validate_url,
02709                                 FALSE/*$no_response*/,
02710                                 TRUE/*$bad_response*/,
02711                                 $text_response);
02712                         }
02713 
02714                         $this->setUser(trim($success_elements->item(0)->getElementsByTagName("user")->item(0)->nodeValue));
02715                         $this->readExtraAttributesCas20($success_elements);
02716                         
02717                         // Store the proxies we are sitting behind for authorization checking
02718                         if ( sizeof($arr = $success_elements->item(0)->getElementsByTagName("proxy")) > 0) {
02719                                 foreach ($arr as $proxyElem) {
02720                                         phpCAS::trace("Storing Proxy: ".$proxyElem->nodeValue);
02721                                         $this->_proxies[] = trim($proxyElem->nodeValue);
02722                                 }
02723                                 $_SESSION['phpCAS']['proxies'] = $this->_proxies;
02724                         }
02725                         
02726                 } else if ( $tree_response->getElementsByTagName("authenticationFailure")->length != 0) {
02727                         // authentication succeded, extract the error code and message
02728                         $auth_fail_list = $tree_response->getElementsByTagName("authenticationFailure");
02729                         $this->authError('PT not validated',
02730                         $validate_url,
02731                         FALSE/*$no_response*/,
02732                         FALSE/*$bad_response*/,
02733                         $text_response,
02734                         $auth_fail_list->item(0)->getAttribute('code')/*$err_code*/,
02735                         trim($auth_fail_list->item(0)->nodeValue)/*$err_msg*/);
02736                 } else {
02737                         $this->authError('PT not validated',
02738                         $validate_url,
02739                         FALSE/*$no_response*/,
02740                         TRUE/*$bad_response*/,
02741                         $text_response);
02742                 }
02743 
02744                 $this->renameSession($this->getPT());
02745                 // at this step, PT has been validated and $this->_user has been set,
02746 
02747                 phpCAS::traceEnd(TRUE);
02748                 return TRUE;
02749         }

02764         // ########################################################################
02765         //  URL
02766         // ########################################################################
02773         private $_url = '';
02774 
02781         private function getURL()
02782         {
02783                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
02784                 // the URL is built when needed only
02785                 if ( empty($this->_url) ) {
02786                         $final_uri = '';
02787                         // remove the ticket if present in the URL
02788                         $final_uri = ($this->isHttps()) ? 'https' : 'http';
02789                         $final_uri .= '://';
02790 
02791                         $final_uri .= $this->getServerUrl();
02792                         $request_uri    = explode('?', $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'], 2);
02793                         $final_uri              .= $request_uri[0];
02794                                 
02795                         if (isset($request_uri[1]) && $request_uri[1])
02796                         {
02797                                 $query_string   = $this->removeParameterFromQueryString('ticket', $request_uri[1]);
02798 
02799                                 // If the query string still has anything left, append it to the final URI
02800                                 if ($query_string !== '')
02801                                 $final_uri      .= "?$query_string";
02802 
02803                         }
02804                                 
02805                         phpCAS::trace("Final URI: $final_uri");
02806                         $this->setURL($final_uri);
02807                 }
02808                 phpCAS::traceEnd($this->_url);
02809                 return $this->_url;
02810         }
02811 
02816         private function getServerUrl(){
02817                 $server_url = '';
02818                 if(!empty($_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED_HOST'])){
02819                         $server_url = $_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED_HOST'];
02820                 }else if(!empty($_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED_SERVER'])){
02821                         $server_url = $_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED_SERVER'];
02822                 }else{
02823                         if (empty($_SERVER['SERVER_NAME'])) {
02824                                 $server_url = $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'];
02825                         } else {
02826                                 $server_url = $_SERVER['SERVER_NAME'];
02827                         }
02828                 }
02829                 if (!strpos($server_url, ':')) {
02830                         if ( ($this->isHttps() && $_SERVER['SERVER_PORT']!=443)
02831                         || (!$this->isHttps() && $_SERVER['SERVER_PORT']!=80) ) {
02832                                 $server_url .= ':';
02833                                 $server_url .= $_SERVER['SERVER_PORT'];
02834                         }
02835                 }
02836                 return $server_url;
02837         }
02838 
02839 
02840 
02850         private function removeParameterFromQueryString($parameterName, $queryString)
02851         {
02852                 $parameterName  = preg_quote($parameterName);
02853                 return preg_replace("/&$parameterName(=[^&]*)?|^$parameterName(=[^&]*)?&?/", '', $queryString);
02854         }
02855 
02856 
02862         public function setURL($url)
02863         {
02864                 $this->_url = $url;
02865         }

02867         // ########################################################################
02868         //  AUTHENTICATION ERROR HANDLING
02869         // ########################################################################
02883         private function authError($failure,$cas_url,$no_response,$bad_response='',$cas_response='',$err_code='',$err_msg='')
02884         {
02885                 phpCAS::traceBegin();
02886 
02887                 $this->printHTMLHeader($this->getString(CAS_STR_AUTHENTICATION_FAILED));
02888                 printf($this->getString(CAS_STR_YOU_WERE_NOT_AUTHENTICATED),htmlentities($this->getURL()),$_SERVER['SERVER_ADMIN']);
02889                 phpCAS::trace('CAS URL: '.$cas_url);
02890                 phpCAS::trace('Authentication failure: '.$failure);
02891                 if ( $no_response ) {
02892                         phpCAS::trace('Reason: no response from the CAS server');
02893                 } else {
02894                         if ( $bad_response ) {
02895                                 phpCAS::trace('Reason: bad response from the CAS server');
02896                         } else {
02897                                 switch ($this->getServerVersion()) {
02898                                         case CAS_VERSION_1_0:
02899                                                 phpCAS::trace('Reason: CAS error');
02900                                                 break;
02901                                         case CAS_VERSION_2_0:
02902                                                 if ( empty($err_code) )
02903                                                 phpCAS::trace('Reason: no CAS error');
02904                                                 else
02905                                                 phpCAS::trace('Reason: ['.$err_code.'] CAS error: '.$err_msg);
02906                                                 break;
02907                                 }
02908                         }
02909                         phpCAS::trace('CAS response: '.$cas_response);
02910                 }
02911                 $this->printHTMLFooter();
02912                 phpCAS::traceExit();
02913 
02914                 if ($this->_exitOnAuthError)
02915                 exit();
02916         }
02917
